flawed_nl_solution:
This week, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60 people watched the first game.
While 80 + 15 = <<80+15=92>>92 people watched the third game.
A total of 80 + 60 + 92 = <<80+60+92=232>>232 people watched the games this week.
Thus, 232 - 200 = <<232-200=32>>32 more people watched the games this week than last week.
#### 32

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 95, not 92. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
